text: > Top News USC fires Steve Sarkisian 1 day after putting coach on leave FILE - In this Sept. 26, 2015, file photo, Southern California coach Steve Sarkisian, front, hugs USC athletic director Pat Haden prior to the team's NCAA college football game against Arizona State in Tempe, Ariz. USC fired Sarkisian one day after the troubled coach was put on leave. Athletic director Pat Haden announced his decision Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in a brief statement. (AP Photo/Ross D. Franklin, File)
